scripts.build-static-overwrites: echo 'copy static files...' && rm -Rf dist/static && mkdir dist/static && cp node_modules/esnet-networkmap-panel/src/components/lib/* dist/static
scripts.build-test-static-overwrites: echo 'copy static files to dist-test...' && rm -Rf dist-test/static && mkdir dist-test/static && cp node_modules/esnet-networkmap-panel/src/components/lib/* dist-test/static && cp static/settings.js dist-test/static/settings.js
scripts.build-test: vite build -c vite.config.test.ts --mode=production && pnpm run build-test-static-overwrites
